Summary: What I have discovered through youtube to be
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Ashland
There were no other sightings in Ashland on or around June 10th 2012
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting DetailsHere in Ashland, OR, we have a lot of "chemtrail" activity. I sometimes document them when they get really bad. I shot a few short video clips, some I aimed right at the sun. When I downloaded these images and began to view them, I noticed little white "orbs" shooting past one of the planes. Three of them, traveling parallel with the plane all traveling at different speeds (breakneck!) and one appears to go through a cloud(chem-cloud).(first 2 seconds, upper left) Also the second one, (use the pause button frequently when the sun is center frame.) I counted at least 8-10 of these things appearing, disappearing and moving in and out of the solar glare. The few people with scientific phd.'s I showed these to are scratching their heads. I am a little nervous sending them, as they appeared to be "working" with the planes...some new technology?!
